/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/c++ -g CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/bxdfs/Lambertian.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/core/BSDF.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/core/BxDF.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/core/Material.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/core/Raytracer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/core/Sampling.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/core/Scene.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/core/global.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Bounce.dir/src/materials/LambertMaterial.cpp.o -o Bounce  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/embree-3.13.3.x86_64.linux/lib /opt/embree-3.13.3.x86_64.linux/lib/libembree3.so.3 -lAlembic -lOpenImageIO
